metadata.title: CVE-2020-11098 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
In FreeRDP before version 2.1.2, there is an out-of-bound read inglyph_cache_put. This affects all FreeRDP clients with `+glyph-cache`option enabled This is fixed in version 2.1.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freerdp2-shadow-x11 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
freerdp2-wayland - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
freerdp2-x11 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
libfreerdp-client2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
libfreerdp-server2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
libfreerdp-shadow-subsystem2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
libfreerdp-shadow2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
libfreerdp2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
libuwac0-0 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
libwinpr-tools2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
libwinpr2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
winpr-utils - 2.2.0+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.0+dfsg1-1').
